name: Valerius Calderon
title: The Valiant Blade

features.title: Feat: Sentinel
features.desc:
You have mastered techniques to take advantage of every drop in any enemy's guard, gaining the following benefits:
  • When you hit a creature with an opportunity attack, the creature's speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.
  • Creatures provoke opportunity attacks from you even if they take the Disengage action before leaving your reach.
  • When a creature within 5 feet of you makes an attack against a target other than you, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature.

features.title: Second Wind
features.desc: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

features.title: Action Surge
features.desc: On your turn, you can take one additional action. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

features.title: Maneuvers (Superiority Dice: 4d8)
features.desc:
You know three maneuvers. You can use only one maneuver per attack. You regain all expended dice on a short or long rest.
  • **Riposte:** When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction and expend one die to make a melee weapon attack. If you hit, add the die to damage.
  • **Trip Attack:** When you hit a creature, you can expend one die to add it to damage and attempt to knock the target prone (DC 13 STR save).
  • **Goading Attack:** When you hit a creature, you can expend one die to add it to damage and attempt to goad the target (DC 13 WIS save). It has disadvantage on attacks against targets other than you.

features.title: Fighting Style: Dueling
features.desc: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

equipment: Chain mail, a longsword, a light crossbow with 20 bolts, a shield, an explorer's pack, a rank insignia (Corporal), a trophy from a fallen enemy (a goblin's dagger), a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp.

personality.traits: I'm always polite and respectful. I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.
personality.ideal: Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect.
personality.bond: I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
personality.flaw: I have little respect for anyone who is not a proven warrior.
